p: All animals were handled in strict accordance with the guidelines of the European Community 86/609/CEE and the protocols were approved by the Committee on Ethics of animal experimentation of our Institution (INIA permit number 2017â€“01). Food and water were provided ad libitum throughout the experiment. Magpies were monitored daily for clinical signs, and those showing severe clinical signs were anesthetized and euthanized, as were all surviving animals at the end of the experiment (17 d.p.i.).
